005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath;
007
008/**
009 * MPST: Exceptions related to the Metapath static context and static
010 * evaluation.
011 */
012@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataClass")
013public class StaticMetapathException
014    extends AbstractCodedMetapathException {
015  /**
016   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXPST0003">err:MPST0003</a>: It
017   * is a <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-error">static
018   * error</a> if an expression is not a valid instance of the Metapath grammar.
019   */
020  // TODO: need a Metapath grammar link
021  public static final int INVALID_PATH_GRAMMAR = 3;
022
023  /**
024   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXPST0017">err:MPST0017</a>: It
025   * is a <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-error">static
026   * error</a> if the
027   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-expanded-qname">expanded
028   * QName</a> and number of arguments in a static function call do not match the
029   * name and arity of a
030   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-known-func-signatures">function
031   * signature</a> in the
032   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-context">static
033   * context</a>.
034   */
035  public static final int NO_FUNCTION_MATCH = 17;
036
037  /**
038   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXQST0070">err:MPST0070</a>: A
039   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-error">static error</a> is
040   * raised if any of the following conditions is statically detected in any
041   * expression.
042   * <ul>
043   * <li>The prefix xml is bound to some namespace URI other than
044   * http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace.</li>
045   * <li>A prefix other than xml is bound to the namespace URI
046   * http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace.</li>
047   * <li>The prefix xmlns is bound to any namespace URI.</li>
048   * <li>A prefix other than xmlns is bound to the namespace URI
049   * http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/.</li>
050   * </ul>
051   */
052  public static final int NAMESPACE_MISUSE = 70;
053
054  /**
055   * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#ERRXQST0070">err:MPST0070</a>: It
056   * is a <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-error">static
057   * error</a> if a QName used in an expression contains a namespace prefix that
058   * cannot be expanded into a namespace URI by using the
059   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#dt-static-namespaces">statically
060   * known namespaces</a>.
061   */
062  public static final int PREFIX_NOT_EXPANDABLE = 81;
063
064  /**
065   * the serial version UID.
066   */
067  private static final long serialVersionUID = 2L;
068
069  /**
070   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, {@code message},
071   * and {@code cause}.
072   *
073   * @param code
074   *          the error code value
075   * @param message
076   *          the exception message
077   * @param cause
078   *          the original exception cause
079   */
080  public StaticMetapathException(int code, String message, Throwable cause) {
081    super(code, message, cause);
082  }
083
084  /**
085   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, {@code message},
086   * and no cause.
087   *
088   * @param code
089   *          the error code value
090   * @param message
091   *          the exception message
092   */
093  public StaticMetapathException(int code, String message) {
094    super(code, message);
095  }
096
097  /**
098   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, no message, and
099   * the {@code cause}.
100   *
101   * @param code
102   *          the error code value
103   * @param cause
104   *          the original exception cause
105   */
106  public StaticMetapathException(int code, Throwable cause) {
107    super(code, cause);
108  }
109
110  @Override
111  public String getCodePrefix() {
112    return "MPST";
113  }
114
115}
